Html:
Hi,
In would like to hide/show or enable/disable a LinkGroup by clicking on a button.
what about hiding/disabling links?
Thanks

You can hide and show groups and links by adding and removing them from the ObservableCollection. See also the ModernMenu demo in the sample application (controls > modern controls > modernmenu). The sample application is available in the download ZIP package.

Disabled groups and links are currently not supported.
